title: Overlay: clamp/skip out-of-frame bboxes
scope: Improve robustness by clamping or skipping bboxes that fall outside the video frame bounds.
Use probed video dimensions where available.
acceptance: Overlay generation clamps or skips invalid/out-of-range bboxes deterministically.
Unit tests cover at least one out-of-range bbox case.

deliverables.title: BBox bounds handling + tests
acceptance: No negative drawbox sizes are emitted; invalid bboxes are ignored/clamped.
